segments.text: Yes , in some sense . I should say I like mountain climbing , you know , because I'm not so professional . How about you
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm the same with you , an amateur mountain climber . I went climbing in the Rocky Mountains with my friends last summer vacation . We spent two days in the mountains .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How did you spend the night there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We pitched a tent in the night , waiting for the sunrise . Wow ! It was too beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had a similar experience , but that was on the top of Tasha Mountain in my country .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tasha Mountain ? It's very famous in China , isn't ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It is one of the Five Mountains .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to climb Tasha Mountain this summer vacation . Would you be my guide ?
segments.speaker: S1
